entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:02 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 08:43 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: ENE 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:16 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 08:16 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Overcast. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 08:16 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
